name: Self-Teaching App
description:
This project was designed under the Reskill American Program as a team project conducted by me and my teammates. The problem statement for our team established that we had to design and implement an App to support self-learning students to find and connect to voluntary tutors in the tech field. Most of the high-level requirements were pre-defined by the program. I was the UX designer of my team and my duties involved going through the Empathizing, Defining, Ideating, Prototyping stages. Here you can access the low-fidelity and high-fidelity prototypes that resulted from this project.


You can also watch the presentation of this project here:

https://youtu.be/xAIIlrIr9sY?t=1960


Link to the project brief
